languages.text: Засмеялся Неумирающий, ибо Домин и так был Его — о том говорилось в великом договоре между Ним и династией Домин, коему договору служит и оберегает каждый ткач Кровавой паутины.
The Undying One laughed, for the Domin was His to begin with: as it was written in the great treaty between Him and the Domin's line, the treaty every spinner of the Bloodspun Web serves and defends.
languages.original_text: Засмеялся Неумирающий, ибо Домин и так был Его — о том говорилось в великом договоре между Ним и династией Домин, коему договору служит и оберегает каждый ткач Кровавой паутины.

traits.locale_text: The Undying One laughed, for the Enim was His to begin with: thus said the great treaty between Him and the Enim's dynasty, the treaty every Bloodweaver serves and defends.
The Undying One laughed, for the Enim was His to begin with: thus said the great treaty between Him and the Enim's dynasty, the treaty every Bloodweaver serves and defends.
The Undying One laughed, for the Enim was His to begin with: as it was written in the great treaty between Him and the Enim's dynasty, the treaty every weaver of the Bloodspun Web serves and defends.

The Undying One laughed, for the Domin was His to begin with: as it was written in the great treaty between Him and the Domin's line, the treaty every spinner of the Bloodspun Web serves and defends.
The Undying One laughed, for the Domin was His to begin with: as it was written in the great treaty between Him and the Domin's line, the treaty every spinner of the Bloodspun Web serves and defends.

languages.text: Der Todlose lachte, denn {mf|der|die} Domin war von Anfang an sein gewesen: Als sei es im großen Vertrag zwischen dem Todlosen und der Linie {mf|des|der} Domin festgeschrieben, dem Vertrag, dem jeder Spinner des Blutgesponnenen Netzes dient und den er verteidigt.
languages.original_text: The Undying One laughed, for the Domin was His to begin with: as it was written in the great treaty between Him and the Domin's line, the treaty every spinner of the Bloodspun Web serves and defends.

traits.locale_text: Der Todlose lachte, denn {mf|der|die} Domin war von Anfang an sein gewesen: Als sei es im großen Vertrag zwischen dem Todlosen und der Linie {mf|des|der} Domin festgeschrieben, dem Vertrag, dem jeder Spinner des Blutgesponnenen Netzes dient und den er verteidigt.

languages.text: El Inmortal rio, pues {mf|el|la} Domin ya le pertenecía por derecho: estaba escrito en el gran tratado que Él había firmado con el linaje de{mf|l| la} Domin, el tratado que cada tejedor de la Red Sanguinolenta sirve y protege.
languages.original_text: The Undying One laughed, for the Domin was His to begin with: as it was written in the great treaty between Him and the Domin's line, the treaty every spinner of the Bloodspun Web serves and defends.

traits.locale_text: El Inmortal rio, pues {mf|el|la} Domin ya le pertenecía por derecho: estaba escrito en el gran tratado que Él había firmado con el linaje de{mf|l| la} Domin, el tratado que cada tejedor de la Red Sanguinolenta sirve y protege.

languages.text: 不死の者が笑った。そもそもドミンは主のものであったのだから。主とドミンの王朝の間に結ばれた重要な条約に記されているとおり、ブラッドスパン・ウェブの織り手は、すべてがこの条約に仕え、それを守っている。
languages.original_text: The Undying One laughed, for the Domin was His to begin with: as it was written in the great treaty between Him and the Domin's line, the treaty every spinner of the Bloodspun Web serves and defends.

traits.locale_text: 不死の者が笑った。そもそもドミンは主のものであったのだから。主とドミンの王朝の間に結ばれた重要な条約に記されているとおり、ブラッドスパン・ウェブの織り手は、すべてがこの条約に仕え、それを守っている。

languages.text: 不死之神大笑起来，因为秘者从一开始就归祂所有，正如祂与秘者的血脉之间的伟大契约所规定的那样。织血罗网的每位编织者，都是为了遵守、捍卫这伟大契约而存在的。
languages.original_text: The Undying One laughed, for the Domin was His to begin with: as it was written in the great treaty between Him and the Domin's line, the treaty every spinner of the Bloodspun Web serves and defends.

traits.locale_text: 不死之神大笑起来，因为秘者从一开始就归祂所有，正如祂与秘者的血脉之间的伟大契约所规定的那样。织血罗网的每位编织者，都是为了遵守、捍卫这伟大契约而存在的。

languages.text: L'Immortel se mit à rire, car {mf|le|la} Domin Lui appartenait depuis toujours, comme il était écrit dans le grand traité entre Lui et la lignée {mf|du|de la} Domin, traité que chaque tisseur de la Toile de Sang sert et défend.
languages.original_text: The Undying One laughed, for the Domin was His to begin with: as it was written in the great treaty between Him and the Domin's line, the treaty every spinner of the Bloodspun Web serves and defends.

traits.locale_text: L'Immortel se mit à rire, car {mf|le|la} Domin Lui appartenait depuis toujours, comme il était écrit dans le grand traité entre Lui et la lignée {mf|du|de la} Domin, traité que chaque tisseur de la Toile de Sang sert et défend.

languages.text: Ölmeyen kahkaha attı. Zira her şeyden önce Domin kendisine aitti. Tıpkı O ve Domin'in soyu arasındaki yüce antlaşmada, Kanipi Ağı'nın her bir dokurunun hizmet edip savunduğu o antlaşmada yazıldığı gibi...
languages.original_text: The Undying One laughed, for the Domin was His to begin with: as it was written in the great treaty between Him and the Domin's line, the treaty every spinner of the Bloodspun Web serves and defends.
